decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the  .............. elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

<p>The proposed&nbsp;two <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="storey" data-wsc-lang="en_US" data-wsc-id="lv0yumu1w2xixbwh8">storey</span> side to rear&nbsp;extension, in conjunction with the existing hip to gable and rear dormer extension, by reason of inappropriate design, cumulative excessive bulk and massing would result in a contrived and incongruous extension that would unacceptably harm the character of the original <span class="scayt-misspell-word" data-scayt-word="dwellinghouse" data-wsc-lang="en_US" data-wsc-id="lv0yumtzhshd3ycwv">dwellinghouse</span> and the visual amenities of the area, contrary to the high quality design aspirations set out in The National Planning Policy Framework (2023), policies D3 (D(1) and D(11)) of The London Plan (2021), Policy CS1.B on the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Development Management Local Plans Policies (2013) and &nbsp;Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).<br></p>
description: Single storey front extension incorporating porch; single and two storey side to rear extension; single storey rear extension; rooflights in side roofslope; external alterations (demolition of attached garage and side extension)
